snippet: Prime Minister Vladimir Putin said on Wednesday that his enemies were planning dirty tricks, including ballot stuffing and even murder, to tarnish the presidential election on Sunday.
abstract: Prime Minister Vladimir Putin of Russia says that his enemies are planning dirty tricks, including ballot stuffing and even murder, to tarnish the presidential election, which he is widely expected to win.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Vladimir Putin said on Wednesday that his enemies were planning dirty tricks, including ballot stuffing and even murder, to tarnish the presidential election on Sunday.

headline.main: Russia: Putin Warns of Dirty Tricks
headline.print_headline: Russia: Putin Warns of Dirty Tricks
